venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Imagine if the mind had its own health resort full of specialists, practitioners, helpers, and advisors of all kinds. And imagine that, in this resort's hundreds of treatment rooms, work could be processed in real time in the native language of the subconscious mind: metaphor and imagery.

In tonight's group hypnosis session, attendees visiting The Spa will find it not only interesting and fun, but also insightful and changemaking.

We'll visit the Room of Being Slender, the Healing Room, the Room of Creativity, the Room of Forgiveness, and a few more interesting rooms.

Bring a pillow, mat and blanket, if desired.

All proceeds to benefit Our Weeping Angel Foundation, a Hingham-based non-profit foundation, which helps people in distress pay for alternative healing treatments and holistic medicine. Suggested donation is $10.00.

Preregistration required.

Contact Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist and Success Coach, at the number above with any questions.

Visit her webpage for more info: www.hypnosis.ws

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Hypnosis Seminar - The Spa of Your Inner Mind
